Mailing Address: c/o Andrew EhmanPO Box 20224Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9H2
Service Details: - Offers a variety of programs and services including a safe place for HIV positive people to meet and socialize- Informally offers support, education and information through social interaction with peers- Peer Compass provides mentoring for People Living With HIV (PLHIV) both newly diagnosed and long term survivors- Offers the online group Poz Linx, and the Men's Advocacy Network closed Facebook group
Eligibility: Open to all ages and genders
Meetings: - Meets twice per month- Provides complimentary coffee, tea and refreshments- Visit the Facebook page for dates and times or call to arrange an appointment with a Peer Compass Mentor
